00108 caddr_t _sbrk(int incr)
00109 {
00110   extern char estack;           /* Defined by the linker */
00111   static char *heap_end;
00112   char *prev_heap_end;
00113 
00114   if (heap_end == 0)
00115   {
00116     heap_end = &estack;
00117     /* give 16KB area for stacks and use the rest of memory for heap*/
00118     heap_end += 0x4000;
00119   }
00120   prev_heap_end = heap_end;
00121 
00122   heap_end += incr;
00123   return (caddr_t) prev_heap_end;
00124 }
